00027 #ifndef __WXLIBIRCLIENTDEFS_H__
00028 #define __WXLIBIRCLIENTDEFS_H__
00029 
00030 #ifdef USING_SOURCE_LIBIRCLIENT
00031         #define WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT
00032     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_LIBIRCLIENT(type) type
00033 #elif defined( LIB_USINGDLL )
00034     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT
00035     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_LIBIRCLIENT(type)
00036 #elif defined( WXMAKINGDLL_LIBIRCLIENT )
00037     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT WXEXPORT
00038     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_LIBIRCLIENT(type) WXEXPORT type
00039 #elif defined(WXUSINGDLL)
00040     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT WXIMPORT
00041     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_LIBIRCLIENT(type) WXIMPORT type
00042 #else // not making nor using DLL
00043     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_LIBIRCLIENT
00044     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_LIBIRCLIENT(type) type
00045 #endif
